thread.title: Global stocks slide, as trade war fears grip markets

title: Global stocks slide, as trade war fears grip markets
text:
Global stocks slide, as trade war fears grip markets Friday, March 23, 2018 - 01:58 
European shares fell on Friday with tech, basic resources stocks and banks bearing the brunt of a wide sell-off triggered by worries that U.S. tariffs on imports from China could escalate into a fully-blown trade war. Kate King reports.
